title: Psychiatry
p: Psychiatry is a branch of medicine that focuses on the diagnosis, research, treatment, and prevention of mental, emotional, and behavioral disorders.

title: Opthalmology
p: Ophthalmology is a branch of medicine that focuses on the diagnosis treatment, and prevention of eye diseases.

title: Cardiology
p: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with diseases of the heart as well as parts of the cardiovascular system and focuses on diagnosing, treating, and preventing diseases such as congenital heart defects, coronary artery disease, heartfailure, electrophysiology, and heart disease.

title: Immumnology
p: Immunology is a branch of biology and medicine that covers the study of the immune system of all organisms and the immune system protects us from infectionthrough various defence lines.

title: Hematology
p: Haematology is a branch of medicine that studies the causes, prognosis, treatment, and prevention of blood-related diseases and focuses on the treatment and prevention of diseases that affect the blood and its components and clotting.

title: Laboratory
p: A laboratory is a facility that provides controlled conditions and where scientific or technical research, experiments, drugs, or chemicals are made and measured.

title: Oncology
p: Oncology is a branch of medicine that focuses on the diagnosis, treatment,and prevention of cancer.

title: Dental
p: Dentistry, also known as dental medicine and oral medicine, is a branch of medicine that studies diseases, disorders, and oral cavity conditions, focusing on diagnosis, treatment, and prevention.
